headline: 3 Big Reasons AME Should Be On Your Watchlist
summary: Over the past six months, AMETEK has been a great trade, beating the S&P 500 by 19.8%. Its stock price has climbed to $229.75, representing a healthy 25.8% increase. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: Unpacking Q4 Earnings: AMETEK (NYSE:AME) In The Context Of Other Internet of Things Stocks
summary: Let’s dig into the relative performance of AMETEK (NYSE:AME) and its peers as we unravel the now-completed Q4 internet of things earnings season.
